config.unfreeze-always.name: Always Unfreeze Time
config.unfreeze-always.tooltip: If true, time will never be paused when the inventory is open, no matter what.
config.unfreeze-while-fishing.name: Unfreeze While Fishing
config.unfreeze-while-fishing.tooltip: If true, time will only be unpaused when the inventory is open while you are actively fishing.
